ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elin | |- ( G e. ( Magma i^i Ass ) <-> ( G e. Magma /\ G e. Ass ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_simplbi | |- ( G e. ( Magma i^i Ass ) -> G e. Magma ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-sgrOLD | |- SemiGrp = ( Magma i^i Ass ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eleq2s | |- ( G e. SemiGrp -> G e. Magma ) |
